Title: The Prince and the Pauper
Writer: Gerrit Graham (animation screenplay), Sam Graham (animation screenplay), Chris Hubbell (animation screenplay), Mark Twain (novel), Jenny Tripp (additional story material), Charles Fleischer (additional story material), Robin Kingsland
Actors: Wayne Allwine, Bill Farmer, Arthur Burghardt, Tony Anselmo
Plot: A poor boy and a prince exchange identities and lives while the villainous Captain of the Guard plots to take advantage of this.
